entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
